sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: DraftKings User Gets Class Status in Suit Over Canceled NBA Bets
feed.summary: An Indiana resident has been granted class status in a lawsuit against DraftKings Inc., alleging that the company canceled his and 98 other users' winning NBA bets without payment. The lawsuit claims that Matthew McAfee and 98 other Indiana residents placed 140 winning bets on the same game through the DraftKings app but were not paid, leading to the judge's decision that there is a "common nucleus of operative facts and issues."

feed.title: DraftKings Inc. - Class A Common Stock (Nasdaq:DKNG) Stock Quote
feed.summary: This page provides a stock quote and recent news for DraftKings Inc. (DKNG), detailing its current trading price, volume, and daily/52-week ranges. It also compiles a list of recent news headlines, primarily from December and November 2025, covering topics like stock performance, prediction markets, and company announcements. The article further includes frequently asked questions about DKNG's public trading status and ticker symbol.

feed.title: Draftkings’ chief legal officer Dodge sells $1.53m in stock
feed.summary: DraftKings' Chief Legal Officer, Dodge R. Stanton, sold 52,777 shares of Class A Common Stock for over $1.53 million on November 6, 2025, while also exercising stock options for the same number of shares. Following these transactions, Stanton directly owns 500,454 shares and 1,420,170 stock options. This sale comes amidst DraftKings reporting third-quarter revenue below analyst expectations, leading to lowered full-year guidance and revised price targets from analysts.

feed.title: DraftKings' Brand Advantage Intact, Despite Predictive Sports Betting Competition
feed.summary: Morningstar believes DraftKings retains a brand advantage due to its technology and product offerings, despite competition from peers and the rise of predictive sports betting. The company's in-house technology platform allows for strong customer data leverage and new product launches, bolstered by its financial strength. DraftKings has successfully extended its daily fantasy sports leadership into a top position in the North American sports betting and i-gaming market.

feed.title: DraftKings Chief Legal Officer Sells Over $1.5 Million in Company Stock
feed.summary: DraftKings' Chief Legal Officer and 10% owner, Dodge R Stanton, sold 52,777 shares of Class A Common Stock on November 6, 2025, for a total of $1,530,533. Following this transaction, Stanton directly owns 500,454 shares of DraftKings' Class A Common Stock. The sale was reported in an SEC Form 4 filing.

feed.title: Draftkings’ chief legal officer Dodge sells $1.8m in shares
feed.summary: DraftKings' Chief Legal Officer, Dodge R. Stanton, recently sold 52,777 shares of Class A Common Stock for over $1.8 million and exercised options for 40,142 shares. This activity comes as DraftKings (NASDAQ: DKNG) is considered undervalued by InvestingPro and is strategically expanding into prediction markets through an acquisition, while analysts maintain a bullish outlook despite potential volatility.

feed.title: Northland, Mizuho Cut DraftKings (DKNG) PT Amid Rising Competitive Threat from Prediction Markets
feed.summary: Northland and Mizuho have lowered their price targets for DraftKings (DKNG) due to concerns about increased competition from prediction markets, such as Kalshi. Northland reduced its target from $55 to $45, while Mizuho decreased its target from $57 to $49, both maintaining their buy ratings. This adjustment reflects the perceived threat these emerging platforms pose to DraftKings' core sports betting business.

feed.title: DraftKings Inc. SEC 10-K Report
feed.summary: DraftKings Inc. has released its 2024 10-K report, detailing significant financial growth with total revenue up 30.1% to $4,767.7 million and a substantial improvement in net loss. The report highlights strategic expansions into new jurisdictions, product innovation, and acquisitions while outlining challenges like competition and regulatory risks. DraftKings plans to continue investing in product offerings, expanding market presence, and improving profitability.

feed.title: Otter Creek Advisors LLC Boosts Holdings in DraftKings Inc. $DKNG - MarketBeat
feed.summary: Otter Creek Advisors LLC significantly increased its stake in DraftKings Inc. (NASDAQ:DKNG) by 87.3% during the second quarter, making it their 23rd largest holding. Other institutional investors also adjusted their positions in the company. The article details DraftKings' recent financial performance, including its stock price, market capitalization, earnings per share, and revenue, alongside analyst ratings and company profile.

feed.title: NorthRock Partners LLC Takes Position in DraftKings Inc. $DKNG
feed.summary: NorthRock Partners LLC has acquired a new position in DraftKings Inc. (NASDAQ:DKNG) by purchasing 8,120 shares valued at approximately $348,000 in the second quarter. Other institutional investors also adjusted their holdings in DraftKings, with the stock currently trading down 0.9% and analysts maintaining a "Moderate Buy" consensus rating with an average price target of $53.00. The company reported better-than-expected quarterly earnings and revenue, providing a positive outlook despite current stock performance.

feed.title: DraftKings Inc. (NASDAQ:DKNG) Receives Consensus Recommendation of "Moderate Buy" from Analysts - MarketBeat
feed.summary: DraftKings Inc. (NASDAQ:DKNG) has received a "Moderate Buy" consensus recommendation from 31 research firms, with an average target price of $53.00. The company reported a significant 36.9% year-over-year revenue increase to $1.51 billion and an earnings per share of $0.30, surpassing expectations. Institutional investors hold 37.70% of the stock.

feed.title: TD Asset Management Inc Sells 106,689 Shares of DraftKings Inc. $DKNG
feed.summary: TD Asset Management Inc significantly reduced its stake in DraftKings Inc. by selling 106,689 shares, decreasing its holdings by 6.6%. Despite this, other institutional investors have increased their positions in DKNG, while analysts maintain a "Moderate Buy" rating with an average price target of $53.00. The company recently reported strong quarterly earnings, surpassing analyst estimates for both EPS and revenue.

feed.title: IFG Advisors LLC Takes Position in DraftKings Inc. $DKNG
feed.summary: IFG Advisors LLC recently acquired a new stake of 8,102 shares in DraftKings Inc. valued at approximately $347,000 during the second quarter. The article also notes significant insider selling, with R Stanton Dodge selling over 105,000 shares for roughly $5 million. DraftKings currently holds a "Moderate Buy" consensus rating from analysts, with a target price of $53.00.

feed.title: Envestnet Portfolio Solutions Inc. Acquires 8,735 Shares of DraftKings Inc. $DKNG
feed.summary: Envestnet Portfolio Solutions Inc. increased its stake in DraftKings Inc. by 5.6% during the second quarter, bringing its total holdings to 164,968 shares valued at $7.075 million. Other institutional investors also adjusted their positions in DraftKings, which reported better-than-expected quarterly earnings and revenue, though one analyst firm did lower its price target. The article details DraftKings' stock performance, market capitalization, and financial ratios.

feed.title: Cwm LLC Acquires 47,875 Shares of DraftKings Inc. $DKNG
feed.summary: Cwm LLC has increased its stake in DraftKings Inc. by 35.4%, acquiring an additional 47,875 shares, bringing its total holdings to 183,230 shares valued at approximately $7.86 million. DraftKings reported strong quarterly earnings of $0.30 per share, surpassing analyst expectations, with revenue reaching $1.51 billion, a 36.9% increase year-over-year. Despite institutional buying, insider trading activity shows executives collectively sold 658,331 shares for $29.29 million in the last quarter.

feed.title: Allspring Global Investments Holdings LLC Sells 678,712 Shares of DraftKings Inc. $DKNG - MarketBeat
feed.summary: Allspring Global Investments Holdings LLC significantly reduced its stake in DraftKings Inc. by selling 678,712 shares, decreasing its position by 24.9% in the second quarter. The firm now holds 2,049,770 shares of DraftKings, valued at approximately $86.07 million. Other institutional investors also adjusted their holdings, while analyst ratings on DraftKings are predominantly "Buy" with an average target price of $53.17.

feed.title: Cathie Wood Is Buying The Dip In DraftKings Stock. Should You? - Barchart.com
feed.summary: Cathie Wood's Ark Invest has recently bought over 511,000 shares of DraftKings (DKNG) stock following a 25% dip. Despite macroeconomic uncertainties, regulatory challenges, and a highly competitive market, analysts maintain a "Strong Buy" rating for DKNG, with a consensus price target indicating significant upside potential. The company reported robust Q2 financial growth, exceeding expectations, and is poised to benefit from the ongoing NFL season.

feed.title: Udine Wealth Management Inc. Boosts Position in DraftKings Inc. $DKNG
feed.summary: Udine Wealth Management Inc. significantly increased its stake in DraftKings Inc. by 38.3% in the second quarter, now holding shares valued at approximately $2.5 million. This comes as DraftKings receives mixed sentiment from analysts, with some downgrading price targets while the company exceeded earnings estimates with $0.30 per share and a 36.9% year-over-year revenue increase. Institutional investment in DraftKings remains strong, with several firms boosting their positions.

feed.title: Waypoint Wealth Counsel Takes $333,000 Position in DraftKings Inc. $DKNG
feed.summary: Waypoint Wealth Counsel initiated a new position in DraftKings Inc. by purchasing 7,774 shares valued at approximately $333,000 during the second quarter. DraftKings reported strong quarterly revenue of $1.51 billion, surpassing analyst expectations. The company maintains a "Moderate Buy" consensus rating from analysts, with a target price of $53.28.

feed.title: DraftKings and Flutter: Online Sports Platforms Face Uncertainty from Predictive Event Competition
feed.summary: Shares of DraftKings and Flutter dropped after Kalshi, a predictive market company, reported record sports contract volume, raising questions about whether predictive event platforms are expanding the market or taking share from traditional online sports apps. Kalshi's success is partly due to its ability to operate in more states and to a younger demographic than online sports companies. Despite this, Morningstar is maintaining its fair value estimates for DraftKings and Flutter, noting their strong revenue growth and potential interest in entering the prediction event markets.

feed.title: DraftKings Inc. Enters Multi-Year Advertising Agreement with NBCUniversal to Enhance Sports Broadcasting Presence
feed.summary: DraftKings Inc. has signed a multi-year advertising agreement with NBCUniversal, significantly increasing its presence across major sports broadcasting through exclusive integrations and digital sponsorships. This partnership will allow DraftKings to engage with millions of fans during key events such as the Super Bowl and FIFA Men's World Cup, leveraging NBCUniversal's extensive reach. The collaboration aims to deliver innovative customer experiences by combining DraftKings' leadership in sports betting with NBCUniversal's premium content.

feed.title: DraftKings Reports Second Quarter Revenue Growth of 37% to $1,513 Million
feed.summary: DraftKings (Nasdaq: DKNG) announced record second-quarter 2025 financial results, with revenue up 37% to $1,513 million, net income of $158 million, and Adjusted EBITDA of $301 million. The company is maintaining its fiscal year 2025 revenue guidance of $6.2 billion to $6.4 billion and Adjusted EBITDA guidance of $800 million to $900 million, expecting to hit the higher end of the revenue range. Growth was driven by customer engagement, efficient acquisition, higher Sportsbook hold percentage, and the acquisition of Jackpocket.

feed.title: DraftKings Beats User’s Deceptive, Fraudulent Marketing Claims
feed.summary: A US District Court judge dismissed a class-action lawsuit against DraftKings, ruling that the company's $1,000 sign-up bonus promotion was not deceptive or fraudulent. The court found that DraftKings adequately disclosed the terms and conditions of its promotion, which required users to meet specific criteria to receive the full bonus value. The plaintiff's claims of New York General Business Law violations, intentional misrepresentation, fraudulent inducement, and unjust enrichment were all rejected.

feed.title: DraftKings ‘Risk-Free’ Bets, Other Promotions Instilled Gambling Addiction: Lawsuit
feed.summary: A class action lawsuit has been filed against DraftKings, alleging that its "risk-free" and "no sweat" promotions are designed to create gambling addictions. Five plaintiffs in Pennsylvania claim that deceptive advertising led to financial losses by requiring players to deposit their own funds, which are then lost, and by offering "Bonus Bets" instead of cash refunds for supposed risk-free wagers. The lawsuit seeks class action status for all Pennsylvania customers, accusing DraftKings of intentional misrepresentation and unjust enrichment through predatory marketing practices.

feed.title: Draftkings class action claims ‘Fantasy Sports’ contests are illegal
feed.summary: A class action lawsuit has been filed against DraftKings Inc. alleging that its "Daily Fantasy Sports" and "Pick6" contests are illegal forms of gambling in California. Three California residents claim DraftKings falsely advertises the legality of these contests within the state, violating California’s anti-gambling laws. The plaintiffs are seeking declaratory, injunctive, and monetary relief for themselves and other California residents who have placed bets on DraftKings.

feed.title: DraftKings Inc. Raises 2025 Revenue Guidance Midpoint to $6.45 Billion and Reaffirms Adjusted EBITDA Guidance
feed.summary: DraftKings Inc. has raised the midpoint of its 2025 revenue guidance to $6.45 billion while reaffirming its Adjusted EBITDA guidance of $900 million to $1 billion. The company reported a 13% increase in Q4 2024 revenue, driven by strong customer engagement and the acquisition of Jackpocket Inc., achieving its first year of positive Adjusted EBITDA in 2024. Despite a decrease in average revenue per monthly unique payer, DraftKings saw a 36% rise in average monthly unique payers, expanding its sports betting and iGaming footprint.

feed.title: DraftKings Accused of Closing Accounts, Pocketing Balances
feed.summary: A class-action lawsuit alleges that DraftKings Inc. illegally closes user accounts and steals their remaining balances. Texas resident Eric Avila claims his account was deactivated with $100 still in it, and he was unable to withdraw the funds. The suit seeks to establish a class of potentially thousands of users who were denied access to their balances and accuses DraftKings of breach of contract and violating consumer protection law.

feed.title: DraftKings Reports Third Quarter Revenue Growth of 39% to $1,095 Million; Introduces Fiscal Year 2025 Revenue Guidance of $6.2 Billion to $6.6 Billion and Reiterates Fiscal Year 2025 Adjusted EBITDA Guidance of $900 Million to $1.0 Billion
feed.summary: DraftKings reported a significant 39% increase in third-quarter revenue, reaching $1,095 million, driven by strong customer engagement and expansion into new markets. The company introduced fiscal year 2025 revenue guidance of $6.2 billion to $6.6 billion and reiterated its Adjusted EBITDA guidance of $900 million to $1.0 billion for the same period. Despite customer-friendly sports outcomes impacting Q4 2024 guidance, DraftKings maintains healthy growth in customer metrics and is expanding its mobile sports betting and iGaming footprint.

feed.title: SHAREHOLDER ALERT: Pomerantz Law Firm Investigates Claims On Behalf of Investors of DraftKings Inc. - DKNG
feed.summary: Pomerantz LLP is investigating potential securities fraud claims against DraftKings Inc. following a significant drop in its stock price. The investigation comes after DraftKings announced financial results for Q2 2024, missing revenue estimates and significantly lowering its fiscal year 2024 Adjusted EBITDA guidance, leading to a nearly 10% stock price decline. Investors who suffered losses are encouraged to contact the law firm for information on joining a potential class action.

feed.title: Court Declines To Dismiss Securities Class Action Alleging That DraftKings NFTs Are ‘Securities’
feed.summary: A U.S. District Court in Massachusetts has denied a motion to dismiss a securities class action alleging that DraftKings NFTs are unregistered securities. The court based its decision on allegations that the NFTs represented an investment in a common enterprise with an expectation of profits derived from DraftKings' efforts, consistent with the Howey test. This ruling, while narrow and fact-dependent, builds on similar prior decisions and sets a framework for analyzing NFT transactions under securities laws.
feed.source: Skadden, Arps, Slate, Meagher & Flom LLP
feed.source_domain: Skadden, Arps, Slate, Meagher & Flom LLP

feed.title: DraftKings class action alleges company uses misleading promotions to lure players in
feed.summary: A class action lawsuit has been filed against DraftKings Inc., alleging that the company uses misleading "risk free" promotional offers to attract new users. Plaintiff Samantha Guery claims that these promotions require users to wager their own money and, if lost, only provide a "Free Bet" credit rather than their original funds, which cannot be directly withdrawn. The lawsuit accuses DraftKings of violating New York General Business Law and seeks various damages and injunctive relief.

feed.title: NYRA and DraftKings announce new sponsorship agreement
feed.summary: DraftKings Inc. and the New York Racing Association (NYRA) have announced a new sponsorship agreement, making DraftKings the presenting sponsor of the Grade 1, $1.25 million Travers Stakes at Saratoga Race Course. Under this agreement, DK Horse will also be the presenting sponsor of the Grade 1, $500,000 DK Horse Acorn during the Belmont Stakes Racing Festival. This partnership aims to expand the audience for world-class racing and promote responsible wagering.

feed.title: DraftKings won't be better on U.K. gambling powerhouse Entain
feed.summary: DraftKings Inc. announced it will not make a final bid for Entain Plc, a deal previously valued at $22.4 billion, thereby halting a potential merger frenzy in the gambling industry. Entain's shares dropped 12% following the news, while DraftKings' shares rose 9%. DraftKings CEO Jason Robins expressed confidence in the company's ability to maintain a leadership position in the North American market independently.

feed.title: Foxwoods and DraftKings Launch Online Sports Betting and iGaming in Connecticut
feed.summary: Foxwoods Resort Casino and DraftKings Inc. have officially launched online and mobile sports betting and online casino gaming in Connecticut. This launch follows a successful soft launch testing period, allowing customers 21 and older to place sports bets and play casino games through the co-branded Foxwoods and DraftKings Sportsbook and Casino app. A virtual press briefing is scheduled to commemorate this launch, emphasizing both companies' commitment to responsible gaming practices.

feed.title: DraftKings To Buy Golden Nugget Online Gaming For $1.56 Billion
feed.summary: DraftKings is set to acquire Golden Nugget Online Gaming in an all-stock deal valued at approximately $1.56 billion, expanding its presence in the iGaming industry. The acquisition will form a new holding company, New DraftKings, with Golden Nugget shareholders receiving 0.365 shares in the new entity. This move aims to leverage Golden Nugget's brand and customer database, creating synergies and following other recent consolidations in the sports betting and iGaming sectors.

feed.title: DraftKings under federal investigation over acquisition of SBTech following short-seller report
feed.summary: DraftKings is under federal investigation by the SEC regarding its acquisition of SBTech, a sports betting technology provider based in Bulgaria, following a report by short-seller Hindenburg Research. The investigation stems from allegations of involvement in black-market gaming and money laundering related to SBTech's business practices prior to the acquisition. DraftKings acknowledges the inquiry and related class-action lawsuits, plans to defend itself, and does not believe the outcome will have a material adverse effect on its financial condition, though it could impact operating results for a particular period.

feed.title: DraftKings Failed to Disclose Illegal Operations of Subsidiary Company to Investors, Lost Them Money, Class Action Alleges
feed.summary: A new class action lawsuit alleges that DraftKings failed to disclose the unlawful operations of its subsidiary company, SBTech Global Limited, to investors, leading to financial losses. The lawsuit claims DraftKings violated the Securities and Exchange Act by acquiring SBTech, which allegedly engages in black-market gaming and money laundering. Following a Hindenburg Research report highlighting these concerns, DraftKings' stock price dropped, and investors are now being called to join the class action.

feed.title: DRAFTKINGS NAMED FIRST OFFICIAL SPORTSBOOK AND DAILY FANTASY PARTNER OF THE PROFESSIONAL FIGHTERS LEAGUE
feed.summary: DraftKings has been named the first official sportsbook and daily fantasy partner of the Professional Fighters League (PFL) in a new multi-year agreement. This partnership will integrate live odds into PFL broadcasts, offer unique prop bets utilizing PFL’s SmartCage technology, and provide PFL-branded pools with cash prizes. The collaboration aims to enhance the fan experience by combining MMA, daily fantasy, and sports betting.

feed.title: DraftKings Inc. Announces Pricing of $1.1 Billion Upsized Offering of Convertible Senior Notes
feed.summary: DraftKings Inc. announced the pricing of a private offering of $1.1 billion aggregate principal amount of 0% Convertible Senior Notes due 2028. The offering was upsized from the previously announced $1 billion, and the sale is expected to close on March 18, 2021. The net proceeds will be used for working capital, general corporate purposes, potential mergers and acquisitions, and technology investments, including approximately $108 million for capped call transactions.

feed.title: DraftKings' partnership with UNLV a ‘win-win proposition’
feed.summary: DraftKings has partnered with UNLV's Center for Gaming Innovation through a $100,000 multiyear sponsorship, leading to a new research and development studio. This collaboration aims to tap into UNLV's talent for casino game research and development, despite DraftKings' daily fantasy sports betting not being allowed in Nevada. The partnership is expected to benefit both entities by fostering innovation in the gaming industry and providing DraftKings with access to local talent and ideas.

feed.title: Cubs, DraftKings eye Wrigley Field sportsbook in exclusive betting deal
feed.summary: The Chicago Cubs and DraftKings announced an exclusive multi-year partnership that could lead to a sportsbook at Wrigley Field. This deal names DraftKings as the official sports betting and daily fantasy sports partner for the Cubs, with plans to build a "first of its kind" retail sportsbook on-site, pending city approval. The collaboration aims to integrate sports betting into the fan experience as the market grows in Illinois.

feed.title: DraftKings discloses SBTech ransomware attack in SEC filing
feed.summary: DraftKings has disclosed in an SEC filing that its merger partner, SBTech, suffered a ransomware attack on March 27, 2020, prior to their three-way merger in April. The attack caused an interruption to SBTech's sports betting and iGaming services, leading them to compensate customers, though the financial impact was deemed immaterial. The SEC filing also states that recommendations for security improvements are being implemented by DraftKings.

feed.title: Upper Peninsula casino partners with DraftKings to bring sports betting to Michigan
feed.summary: DraftKings has announced a partnership with Bay Mills Resort & Casino to introduce sports betting to Michigan. This collaboration will offer both mobile and online sportsbook access, as well as an in-person retail betting location at the casino. Michigan joins six other states where DraftKings has established a retail sportsbook presence.

feed.title: Disney Holds Millions Of DraftKings Shares Following Public Listing
feed.summary: The Walt Disney Company owns over 18.2 million shares of DraftKings stock, valued at more than $364 million, following DraftKings' recent public listing. Disney acquired this stake through its purchase of 21st Century Fox in March 2019 and is designated as a "passive investor," prohibiting active involvement in DraftKings' operations or investments in direct competitors. This clarifies Disney's near-term strategy for its DraftKings investment, which originated from Fox's earlier investment in the daily fantasy sports operator.

feed.title: DraftKings Agrees To $102K Unfair Betting Event Class Action Settlement
feed.summary: DraftKings has reached a $102,000 class action settlement with a bettor who claimed the rules for its 2019 Sports Betting National Championship were unclear and inconsistently applied, making the competition unfair. The settlement, awaiting preliminary approval, would provide 150 "DraftKing Dollars" to each of the nearly 200 Class Members who paid $10,000 to enter, with additional payouts for the named plaintiff and class counsel. DraftKings denies liability but agreed to the settlement to avoid further litigation costs, and will also post clearer rules for future championships.

feed.title: Here are 5 things to know about DraftKings, after it went public and fetched a $6 billion market cap
feed.summary: DraftKings Inc. went public through a blank-check company merger, achieving a market valuation of over $6 billion. The article highlights that the company's CEO holds approximately 90% of the voting rights, making it a controlled company. DraftKings, which started in 2012 with daily fantasy sports, is expected to see online gambling eclipse these roots.

feed.title: DraftKings Closes Business Combination and Will Begin Trading on the Nasdaq Stock Exchange
feed.summary: DraftKings Inc. announced it has completed its business combination with SBTech (Global) Limited and Diamond Eagle Acquisition Corp., creating a vertically integrated sports betting and online gaming company. Beginning April 24, 2020, DraftKings' Class A common stock will trade on the Nasdaq Global Select Market under "DKNG" and its warrants under "DKNGW". An investor call is scheduled for April 24, 2020, to discuss the closing and public market entry.
